description.narrative: Human resources Capacities Available for Education programme effectiveness, which contributes to Safe And Equitable Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Services And Practices. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, more children have access to early stimulation and quality basic education and learning in inclusive and safe school environments.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Human resources Capacities Available for Education programme effectiveness

description.narrative: UNICEF Sudan maintained and recruited education staff members and consultants to support the effective implementation of the UNICEF education programme. These staff are of different levels and specialties and are based in Khartoum and all UNICEF field offices in Sudan.The education programme has 31 staff members currently onboard with 3 vacant positions. Regarding gender parity, 12 of the staff members are women (39%), while for geographic parity 24 are national staff members; there are a total of 7 international staff: 2 international staff are from donor countries and 5 internationals are from programme countries (71%). | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2022
